slides.message: Thank you so much for taking a leading role on the new Search discipline newsletter, Pulse on Search. I’m so friggin’ happy with the newsletter, and it’s all thanks to your great ideas, attention to detail, and industrious work ethic. I’ve told you so many times before, but I’ll say it again now: you are an absolute rockstar! Thank you!

Big thanks to Chris for putting a ton of elbow grease into a massive J&J Careers keyword deliverable this month. I know it was a frustratingly monotonous task that repeatedly grew in size and scale. But I appreciate that you stuck with it and really helped execute the dang thing. I KNOW the clients will appreciate all of your energy and thinking. Thanks, Chris!
